StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateLsiHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@LsiHistoryID int ,@PersonID int ,@SponsorName varchar(100) ,@RankID int ,@ServiceID int ,@StatusID int ,@Notes varchar(255) ,@LastEditBy varchar(15))
AS
UPDATE [dbo].[LSI_HISTORY] SET [PERSON_ID] = @PersonID ,[SPONSOR_NAME] = @SponsorName ,[RANK_ID] = @RankID ,[SERVICE_ID] = @ServiceID ,[STATUS_ID] = @StatusID ,[NOTES] = @Notes ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [LSI_HISTORY_ID] = @LsiHistoryID
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0
INSERT INTO [dbo].[LSI_HISTORY] ([PERSON_ID] ,[SPONSOR_NAME] ,[RANK_ID] ,[SERVICE_ID] ,[STATUS_ID] ,[NOTES] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@PersonID ,@SponsorName ,@RankID ,@ServiceID ,@StatusID ,@Notes ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate())
